site_name: Telephone Exchange, Telecommunications Mast Roof Top 32043
description: Installation of 3x antennas, 1x 0.3m dish, a GPS module and associated ancillary development.
decision_conditions: The applicant has submitted insufficient information for the LPA to determine with certainty that the proposal would be acceptable in terms of its siting and appearance and as such the proposal would not accord with Policies CS8 and DM10 of the Council's adopted LDF Core Strategy April 2012.

The assessment of this application is been based on measurements taken from the submitted drawings / plans. If it transpires that the drawings / plans submitted are incorrect this would nullify the validity of this decision and you are advised to submit a fresh application with the correct information / drawings.
